dct_title_s: Situs Terr√¶ promissionis S.S. Bibliorum intelligentiam exacte aperiens
dct_description_sm: per Chr. Adrichom ; sculpserunt Everardus Sim. Hamers-veldt et Salomon Rogeri ; sumptibus Henrici Hondii.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "Miliaria unius horae" and "Milliaria germanica communia".
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries of the tribes of Israel, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Includes descriptive text and features illustrations of a wreath of fruit, cherubs, holy men, a compass rose, and a ship.
Appears in Mercator, Gerard and Hondius, Jodocus' Atlas ou representation du monde universel ... Amsterdam, Henricus Hondius, 1633.
